title: Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 437 of 2020)),
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Parent’s Leave and Benefit Act 2019
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Parent’s Leave and Benefit Act 2019 

(Commencement) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited parent leave benefit act 2019 (commencement) order 2022

title: Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 437 of 2020)),
heading: 2. The 1st day of July 2022 is appointed as the day on which paragraph
text_raw:
2. The 1st day of July 2022 is appointed as the day on which paragraph 
(b)(iii) of the definition of “relevant parent” in section 2(1) of the Parent’s 
Leave and Benefit Act 2019 (No. 35 of 2019) shall come into operation. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 8th July, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [322] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

29 June, 2022. 

RODERIC O'GORMAN, 

Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and 
Youth. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [322]
